activities:
- personal demongraphic information for on-line surveys
- on-line survey respondents' perceptions, evaluations, and feedback on given subjects, including people's skills, competencies, behavioral patterns/tendencies and general work performance
- site viewers contact information
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; For all other types of data: the American Arbitration Association (AAA)
